text.autoconfig.Amanita.title: Amanita Config
text.autoconfig.Amanita.option.general.c: The string written here will be used as your client brand when connecting to Minecraft servers, if nothing is written it will not change
text.autoconfig.Amanita.option.general.f: Set to true for the Z axis in the debug menu (F3) to display as completely blue like the other axes rather than a washed out blue
text.autoconfig.Amanita.option.general.n: Set to true to disable the movement blocking that occurs when holding two movement keys at the same time
text.autoconfig.Amanita.option.general.s: Set to true to keep your crosshair and currently selected block outline visible when in spectator mode
text.autoconfig.Amanita.option.general.t: Set to true to display your total experience before being converted to a level in brackets beside your level
text.autoconfig.Amanita.option.cosmetics: Set to true to enable client-sided particle effects around the player
Select the particle effect that will be used for particle styles
Select the particle style that will appear around the player
